metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugin collection: architecture patterns, intelligent delegation, resource optimization, code review, and spatial memory systems

plugins.name: abstract
plugins.description: Meta-skills infrastructure for Claude Code plugin ecosystem - skill authoring, hook development, modular design patterns, and evaluation frameworks

plugins.name: attune
plugins.description: Full-cycle project development - brainstorm ideas, create specifications, plan architecture, initialize projects, and execute implementation with integrated workflows from superpowers and spec-kit

plugins.name: archetypes
plugins.description: Architecture paradigm selection and implementation planning - 14 paradigm skills from functional-core to microservices

plugins.name: conjure
plugins.description: Intelligent delegation framework for routing tasks to external LLMs (Gemini, Qwen) while retaining strategic oversight

plugins.name: conserve
plugins.description: Resource optimization and bloat detection - CPU/GPU performance monitoring, token conservation, bloat detection, and codebase cleanup

plugins.name: imbue
plugins.description: Intelligent workflow methodologies - review-core scaffolding, diff analysis, evidence logging, and catchup patterns

plugins.name: leyline
plugins.description: Storage and persistence patterns - templates for data management and storage solutions

plugins.name: memory-palace
plugins.description: Spatial memory techniques based on Matteo Ricci's method of loci for enhanced knowledge organization

plugins.name: minister
plugins.description: Project management plugin that aligns initiatives with GitHub data - turns repositories, issues, and projects into status dashboards

plugins.name: parseltongue
plugins.description: Language detection, pattern matching, and testing guidance for multi-language codebases

plugins.name: pensive
plugins.description: Comprehensive code review toolkit - 7 specialized review skills for architecture, bugs, APIs, math, Rust, tests, and Makefiles

plugins.name: sanctum
plugins.description: Git and workspace operations - commit messages, PR prep, documentation updates, version bumping

plugins.name: scry
plugins.description: Media generation - terminal recordings (VHS), browser recordings (Playwright), GIF processing, and media composition

plugins.name: spec-kit
plugins.description: Specification-driven development - spec writing, implementation planning, and task orchestration
